front.title: On loading MUD URLs from QR codes

abstract.t: This informational document details a protocol to load MUD definitions for devices which have no integrated Manufacturer Usage Description (MUD) [RFC8520] support.
This document is published to inform the Internet community of this mechanism to allow interoperability and to serve as a basis of other standards work if there is interest.
